snippet: Raheem Sterling and Joe Allen scored in a 2-0 win over Newcastle, keeping alive Liverpool’s chances of qualifying for next season’s Champions League.
abstract: Liverpool beats Newcastle, 2-0, in Premier League play; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Raheem Sterling and Joe Allen scored in a 2-0 win over Newcastle, keeping alive Liverpool’s chances of qualifying for next season’s Champions League.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Liverpool Maintains Hope
